criteria: >80% unit test coverage; All integration tests for State Machine and Read APIs passing; CI/CD pipeline successfully deploys service to staging; Security scan clean.
bypass_criteria: Not applicable for this foundational gate.
success_metrics: Automated deployment to staging is successful and repeatable. All foundational tests pass.

criteria: All E2E tests for Order Creation and Cancellation Sagas passing; No data inconsistencies found during failure scenario testing; All business rules for cancellation are met.
bypass_criteria: None. This gate validates core business functionality.
success_metrics: Core business transactions (order creation/cancellation) are fully functional and resilient to failures.
